title: vangamali kaDarkkArai (isai nATakam titled kArai tanda shivakAmi)
language:
caraNam  
caraNam 1  				(rAgA:  hamsadhvani, k/cApu tALA) vangamali kaDarkkArai vaLanATTu vaNigr tangaLinat-talaivanAr tanatattan enum nallAn
mangalakkuland-azhaikka mA tavattumagavAga pongiya pErazhagu miga punitavati pirandAr

 caraNam 2   IshanallAdonrillai enbadanai uNarndEvAshamalar sorindiTTu vAyArap-paravi nEshamuDan 
perunidhiyaip-pirai shUDum Aranaip-pUjanai shei manattavarAip-punitavati vaLarndAr
 caraNam 3  				(rAgA:  nATakuranji, t/Eka tALA) nIDu kaDal nAgai nagar nidhipati enbAnin pADu pugazh tiru selvan parama dattanukkE
nADi vandu peN kETTAr nayat-tagum tiruvai kUDi vanda kELirellAm koNDADi magiDi
					(Adi tALA, tisragati)
 caraNam 4   taLir naDai maDamayilai tA tavizhtArAnum kaLikoL shuTram pOTragaDi maNamE purindAr
 caraNam 5  				(rAgA:  cArukEsi, Adi tALA) anburugudana dattan arumarugarODu tan kuDikk-arum selvi tagaip-punitavatiyai
maN pugazh nAgai nagarkk-anuppAmal tammUril viNmaruvum viyanagaram viyappuravE amaittAn

 caraNam 6   tagaippilE kAdal tEkki tam manaiyin vaLam perukki mugizhttanar iruvarumE mukkaNNan tiruvaruLAl
shivanArtham aDiyArai cintai niurai anbuDan tava selvi virundOmbit-tanip-perumai tandanar
 caraNam 7  				(rAgA:  pUrvikalyANi, Adi tALA) Ongu nanneriyAn uttama semmal pAnguDaiya parama dattanukk-oru nAL 
AnguTra anbanAr Aval migak-koNDu mAng-kani iraNDinai magizhvODu tandanar

 caraNam 8   kaNavan tAm tandiTTa kanigaLai vAngi am-maNamalark-kUndalAL mADamadil vaitta pin
paNavaravam punaiyum paraman tan tiruttoNDar uNNAp-pasiyoDu ucciyilangE vandAr

 caraNam 9   illALan koDuttiDa inkani kaLilonrai pollAda avan sinattaip-puramE taLLi
nallAla vAyar tam naTroNDarukkiTTE ollAngamudaLittu vagai migak-koNDAL
 caraNam 10  				(rAgA:  vasantA, t/Eka tALA) manniya sIrk-kaNavanumE manai vanda maddiyattil innaDi silkarigaLuDan EndizhaiyAL vaittu
nAn madhura mAng-kaniyum nayamayavaL suvaikka ponnanaiya pUnkuzhalAL purindilaiyil iTTAL

innamoru kani tanaiyum iDugavenak-kETka inaiyadoru pazham peravE Edum vazhiyinri munnavanai 
avaL tudikka ( Om namah shivAya) mun tOnrik-kaiyil annatoru arum kaniyum amarndadaik-kaNDAL
caraNam 11  				(rAgA:  kApi, Adi tALA) iNaiyillA iccuvaiyE iddharaNiyonrO muDivillA mUvulagam muTrum aridannO
ittagaiya inkaniyum kiDaittadevvArena attanaruL tAm enavE aNangumE puganrAL

 caraNam 12   mAsaTra nAthanumE manaivipAl sangaiyuDan IshanuDai aruLAyin innonru koNarkenna
AshaTra tan shollaiaccutam sheigavaeat-tEsu pirai shaDaiyAnai deiva magaL tudittAL
 caraNam 13  				(rAgA:  sindhubhairavi, Adi tALA) mAng-kaniyonru vara mAdarasi adait-tara vAngiya kaniyumE vanda vidam maraiyavE
nIngiya shangaiyAl niraindAn atishayam Ongiya bhayam koNDu uLLam taDumArinAn
 caraNam 14  				(rAgA:  shahAnA, Adi tALA) kUDik-kulAviDak-kuTumbiniyallaLivaL tEDi vaNangiDa dEvataiyE ena 
sIriya NeNNamadai cintaiyil tEkkiyE nErizhaiyAL tanai nIngiDa niccayittAL
				
 caraNam 15   neDunidhi t
